summary: Kurdish-Iranian poet Sahel has just been released from a thirty-year prison sentence in Iran. Now the one thing keeping him going is the thought of finding his wife, who thinks him dead for over twenty years.
cast: Behrouz Vossoughi|Monica Bellucci|Yilmaz Erdogan|Caner Cindoruk|Beren Saat|Arash|Umut Orkun Eskibatman|Belçim Bilgin|Ali Pourtash|Ahmet Mümtaz Taylan
title: Fasle kargadan
